## üéØ COMPLETE BUSINESS LEAD GENERATOR
**ALL FEATURES INCLUDED**

nodes.name: Process and Paginate Results
nodes.notes: This node processes results from both the initial search and all subsequent paginated fetches. It consolidates leads, handles duplicates, and determines if another page is needed.

parameters.content:
## ‚úÖ COMPLETE SETUP

**Replace these 4 IDs:**
## 1. YOUR_SERPAPI_CREDENTIAL_ID (appears twice)
## 2. YOUR_GOOGLE_SHEET_ID
## 3. YOUR_SHEET_GID  
## 4. YOUR_GOOGLE_SHEETS_CREDENTIAL_ID

**Test with:**
- Business: dentists
- City: Meknes
- Country: Morocco
- Leads: 44

**Features:**
‚úÖ Complete coordinate extraction
‚úÖ Full SerpAPI pagination
‚úÖ Lead scoring & sorting
‚úÖ 20 data columns
‚úÖ Social media extraction
‚úÖ No duplicates

**This has EVERYTHING!**

## üîÑ PAGINATION CONTROL

**Continuation Logic:**
- Checks if continue_search = true
- Verifies max_results limit not exceeded
- Routes to either continue or finish

**TRUE (Continue):**
- More results needed
- Routes to Wait node
- Then back to SERPAPI search

**FALSE (Finish):**
- Max results reached
- No more results available
- Routes to sorting and saving

**Safety Features:**
- Prevents infinite loops
- Rate limiting with delays
- Progress tracking

## üîß SETUP INSTRUCTIONS

**1. SerpAPI Credentials:**
## - Go to serpapi.com
## - Sign up for free account (100 searches/month)
## - Get your API key from dashboard
## - Add to n8n credentials as "SerpAPI"
## - Paste API key in Authentication field

## **2. Google Sheets Setup:**
## - Create new Google Sheet
## - Add "Leads" tab if needed
## - Set up OAuth2 credentials in n8n
## - Update sheet ID in Save node

## **3. Form Access:**
## - Webhook URL: your-n8n-url/webhook/lead-gen
## - Share this URL for lead generation requests

## üåç STEP 1: GET COORDINATES

**Why this step is crucial:**
- Converts city names to GPS coordinates
- Ensures accurate location targeting
- Prevents defaulting to US locations
- Uses Google Search for coordinate lookup

**SerpAPI Call:**
- Engine: Google Search
- Query: "{city}, {country} coordinates"
- Results: Organic + Knowledge Graph

**Handles:**
- Major cities worldwide
- Coordinate extraction from results
- Fallback to predefined coordinates

## üó∫Ô∏è STEP 2: GOOGLE MAPS SEARCH

**SerpAPI Google Maps Engine:**
- Uses exact GPS coordinates for targeting
- Language: English (hl=en)
- Pagination support with 'start' parameter
- Returns comprehensive business data

**Data Retrieved:**
- Business name, address, phone
- Website, rating, reviews, hours
- GPS coordinates, place_id
- Service options, categories
- Direct business links

**Pagination Logic:**
- Fetches ~20 results per request
- Continues until max_results reached
- 2-second delay between requests

## üìä GOOGLE SHEETS EXPORT

**15 Rich Data Columns:**
1. Business Name
2. Phone (Excel-safe format)
3. Website URL
4. Email (estimated)
5. Full Address
6. Rating (1-5 stars)
7. Review Count
8. Operating Hours
9. Google Maps Link (direct profile)
10. Facebook Profile
11. Instagram Profile
12. LinkedIn Profile
13. Business Category
14. Search Query Used
15. Search Location

**Features:**
- Appends to existing data
- No duplicates (if using unique constraints)
- Ready for CRM import
- Perfect for sales outreach
